entry.name: QUnit.extend
entry.title: QUnit.extend()

argument.name: target
argument.desc: An object whose properties are to be modified

argument.name: mixin
argument.desc: An object describing which properties should be modified

entry.desc: Copy the properties defined by the mixin object into the target object

longdesc.p: This method will modify the target object to contain the "own" properties defined by the mixin. If mixin object specifies the value of any attribute as undefined, this property will instead be removed from the target object.

example.desc: Define a custom mod2 assertion that tests if the provided numbers are equivalent in modulo 2.
